title.bibl: Saloniki, March 31, 1928, p. 4 Greek American Republican Club of Cook County Louis L. Emerson for Governor of Illinois.

div.bibl: Saloniki, March 31, 1928, p. 4 GREEK AMERICAN REPUBLICAN CLUB OF COOK COUNTY LOUIS L. EMERSON FOR GOVERNOR OF ILLINOIS.

body.p: We, the Greek American Republican Club of Cook County, at a meeting assembled unanimously resolve;
That we hereby endorse the candidacy of Louis L. Emerson for Governor of Illinois.
His election would place the great State of Illinois in the position it should occupy among the other states of this Great Union.
